guidelineAll.subtitle: Please, make sure your invoice includes the following:
guidelineAll.rule_1: Total amount should be 1200 USDC excluding taxes
guidelineAll.rule_2: Make sure to send your invoice in US Dollars ($)
guidelineAll.rule_3: Apply taxes according to your local legislation

sample_to_download: We highly recommend downloading our invoice sample to help you create your own correctly.
clickToUpload: Click to upload or drag and drop
errorMaxSizeFile: The file is too large, please upload a file smaller than 3MB
fileType: Only PDF files smaller than 3MB are accepted

alert.title: Find some guidlines on how to properly generate your invoice
alert.description: We’ll have to reject it if it doesn’t match requirements.

alert.title: Please double check that everything is correct
alert.description: Once approved it will trigger the payment process and can’t be edited.

error.title: An error occurred
error.description: We were unable to generate the invoice, please try again later
